content: A federal appeals court on Friday overturned a $663.4 million judgment against Trinity Industries Inc  which had been accused of misleading the government by selling highway guardrails that could impale vehicles.
name: Trinity Industries Inc
title: Trinity wins reversal of $663 million U.S. judgment over guardrails

content: NEW YORK  June 9 A U.S. judge on Tuesday ordered Trinity Industries Inc to pay $663.4 million after a federal jury found it liable for failing to tell a government highway agency about changes made to a widely used guardrail system that raised safety concerns.
name: Trinity Industries Inc
title: Trinity Industries ordered to pay $663.4 mln in guardrail case

content: NEW YORK A U.S. judge on Tuesday ordered Trinity Industries Inc to pay $663.4 million after a federal jury found it liable for failing to tell a government highway agency about changes made to a widely used guardrail system that raised safety concerns.
name: Trinity Industries Inc
title: Trinity Industries ordered to pay $663.4 million in guardrail case

content: NEW YORK  June 9 A U.S. judge on Tuesday ordered Trinity Industries Inc to pay $663.4 million after a federal jury found it liable for failing to tell a government highway agency about changes made to a widely used guardrail system that raised safety concerns.
name: Trinity Industries Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Trinity Industries ordered to pay $663.4 mln in guardrail case

content: WASHINGTON  March 13 A U.S. regulator said on Friday that testing on the guardrail most commonly used on U.S. Interstate Highways indicates the product is safe  sparing governments the huge cost of having to replace hundreds of thousands of guardrail caps used nationwide.
name: Trinity Industries Inc
title: UPDATE 2-U.S. regulator says Trinity guardrail meets standards

content: WASHINGTON Trinity Industries' ET-Plus guardrail system has passed crash tests conducted after concerns were raised about its safety  the U.S. Federal Highway Administration said on Friday.
name: Trinity Industries Inc
title: Trinity ET-plus guardrail passes four crash tests -U.S. regulator

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 6 Trinity Industries'  ET-Plus guardrail system has passed crash tests conducted after concerns were raised about its safety  the U.S. Federal Highway Administration said on Friday.
name: Trinity Industries Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Trinity ET-plus guardrail passes four crash tests -U.S. regulator
